verses.verse: וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took קֹ֔רַח <WH7141> Now Korah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יִצְהָ֥ר <WH3324> of Izhar בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קְהָ֖ת <WH6955> of Kohath בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son לֵוִ֑י <WH3878> of Levi וְדָתָ֨ן <WH1885> and Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֜ם <WH48> and Abiram בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> the sons אֱלִיאָ֛ב <WH446> of Eliab וְא֥וֹן <WH203> and On בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פֶּ֖לֶת <WH6431> of Peleth בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> sons רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <WH7205> of Reuben

וַיָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <WH6965> And they rose up לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> Moses וַאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH582> with certain מִבְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> and fifty וּמָאתָ֑יִם <WH3967> two hundred נְשִׂיאֵ֥י <WH5387> princes עֵדָ֛ה <WH5712> of the assembly קְרִאֵ֥י <WH7148> famous מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> in the congregation אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH582> men שֵֽׁם׃ <WH8034> of renown

וַיִּֽקָּהֲל֞וּ <WH6950> And they gathered themselves together עַל־ <WH5921> against מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> against Moses וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> above אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> and against Aaron וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶם֮ <WH413> to רַב־ <WH7227> unto them [Ye take] too much לָכֶם֒ כִּ֤י <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> for all הָֽעֵדָה֙ <WH5712> upon you seeing all the congregation כֻּלָּ֣ם <WH3605> every קְדֹשִׁ֔ים <WH6918> [are] holy וּבְתוֹכָ֖ם <WH8432> [is] among יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> every one of them and the LORD וּמַדּ֥וּעַ <WH4069> why תִּֽתְנַשְּׂא֖וּ <WH5375> them wherefore then lift ye up עַל־ <WH5921> above קְהַ֥ל <WH6951> yourselves above the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> and the LORD
וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And when Moses וַיִּפֹּ֖ל <WH5307> [it] he fell עַל־ <WH5921> on פָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> upon his face

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> And he spake אֶל־ <WH413> to קֹ֜רַח <WH7141> unto Korah וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲדָתוֹ֮ <WH5712> and unto all his company לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying בֹּ֠קֶר <WH1242> Even to morrow וְיֹדַ֨ע <WH3045> will shew יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who ל֛וֹ וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַקָּד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> who [are] his and [who is] holy וְהִקְרִ֣יב <WH7126> and will cause [him] to come near אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> about וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom יִבְחַר־ <WH977> unto him even [him] whom he hath chosen בּ֖וֹ יַקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> will he cause to come near אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> about
זֹ֖את <WH2063> likewise עֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> This do קְחוּ־ <WH3947> Take לָכֶ֣ם מַחְתּ֔וֹת <WH4289> you censers קֹ֖רַח <WH7141> Korah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲדָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5712> and all his company

וּתְנ֣וּ <WH5414> And put בָהֵ֣ן ׀ <WH2004> therein אֵ֡שׁ <WH784> fire וְשִׂימוּ֩ <WH7760> and put עֲלֵיהֶ֨ן <WH5921> and קְטֹ֜רֶת <WH7004> incense לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> in them before יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD מָחָ֔ר <WH4279> to morrow וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> and it shall be [that] the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom יִבְחַ֥ר <WH977> doth choose יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> whom the LORD ה֣וּא <WH1931> who הַקָּד֑וֹשׁ <WH6918> he [shall be] holy רַב־ <WH7227> [ye take] too much לָכֶ֖ם בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> upon you ye sons לֵוִֽי׃ <WH3878> of Levi
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to קֹ֑רַח <WH7141> unto Korah שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear נָ֖א <WH4994> now בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> I pray you ye sons לֵוִֽי׃ <WH3878> of Levi

הַמְעַ֣ט <WH4592> [Seemeth it but] a small thing מִכֶּ֗ם <WH4480> at כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִבְדִּיל֩ <WH914> hath separated אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> unto you that the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> מֵעֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> you from the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לְהַקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> to bring you near אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> to himself לַעֲבֹ֗ד <WH5647> to himself to do אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבֹדַת֙ <WH5656> the service מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלַעֲמֹ֛ד <WH5975> and to stand לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> the congregation לְשָׁרְתָֽם׃ <WH8334> to minister

וַיַּקְרֵב֙ <WH7126> And he hath brought thee near אֹֽתְךָ֔ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אַחֶ֥יךָ <WH251> [to him] and all thy brethren בְנֵי־ <WH1121> the sons לֵוִ֖י <WH3878> of Levi אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> for וּבִקַּשְׁתֶּ֖ם <WH1245> with thee and seek גַּם־ <WH1571> for כְּהֻנָּֽה׃ <WH3550> ye the priesthood

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> For which cause אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲדָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH5712> [both] thou and all thy company הַנֹּעָדִ֖ים <WH3259> [are] gathered together עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> against the LORD וְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> and what [is] Aaron מַה־ <WH4100> who ה֔וּא <WH1931> he כִּ֥י <WH3588> for [תִלֹּונוּ כ] (תַלִּ֖ינוּ <WH3885> abide ק) עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> against

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses לִקְרֹ֛א <WH7121> to call לְדָתָ֥ן <WH1885> Dathan וְלַאֲבִירָ֖ם <WH48> and Abiram בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons אֱלִיאָ֑ב <WH446> of Eliab וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> which said לֹ֥א <WH3808> We will not נַעֲלֶֽה׃ <WH5927> We will not come up

הַמְעַ֗ט <WH4592> [Is it] a small thing כִּ֤י <WH3588> that הֶֽעֱלִיתָ֙נוּ֙ <WH5927> thou hast brought us up מֵאֶ֨רֶץ <WH776> out of a land זָבַ֤ת <WH2100> that floweth חָלָב֙ <WH2461> with milk וּדְבַ֔שׁ <WH1706> and honey לַהֲמִיתֵ֖נוּ <WH4191> to kill בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> us in the wilderness כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תִשְׂתָּרֵ֥ר <WH8323> thyself altogether עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> over גַּם־ <WH1571> also הִשְׂתָּרֵֽר׃ <WH8323> a prince

אַ֡ף <WH637> Moreover לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor אֶל־ <WH413> into אֶרֶץ֩ <WH776> us into a land זָבַ֨ת <WH2100> that floweth חָלָ֤ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבַשׁ֙ <WH1706> and honey הֲבִ֣יאֹתָ֔נוּ <WH935> thou hast not brought וַתִּ֨תֶּן־ <WH5414> or given לָ֔נוּ נַחֲלַ֖ת <WH5159> us inheritance שָׂדֶ֣ה <WH7704> of fields וָכָ֑רֶם <WH3754> and vineyards הַעֵינֵ֞י <WH5869> the eyes הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH376> of הָהֵ֛ם <WH1992> these תְּנַקֵּ֖ר <WH5365> wilt thou put out לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor נַעֲלֶֽה׃ <WH5927> arise

וַיִּ֤חַר <WH2734> wroth לְמֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> was very וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּ֖פֶן <WH6437> Respect אֶל־ <WH413> about מִנְחָתָ֑ם <WH4503> not thou their offering לֹ֠א <WH3808> nor חֲמ֨וֹר <WH2543> ass אֶחָ֤ד <WH259> one מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> like נָשָׂ֔אתִי <WH5375> I have not taken וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor הֲרֵעֹ֖תִי <WH7489> from them neither have I hurt אֶת־ <WH853> אַחַ֥ד <WH259> one מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to קֹ֔רַח <WH7141> unto Korah אַתָּה֙ <WH859> You וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲדָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH5712> Be thou and all thy company הֱי֖וּ <WH1961> be present לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you וָהֵ֛ם <WH1992> with וְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> thou and they and Aaron מָחָֽר׃ <WH4279> to morrow

וּקְח֣וּ ׀ <WH3947> And take אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man מַחְתָּת֗וֹ <WH4289> his censer וּנְתַתֶּ֤ם <WH5414> and put עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> and קְטֹ֔רֶת <WH7004> incense וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֞ם <WH7126> in them and bring לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> ye before יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man מַחְתָּת֔וֹ <WH4289> his censer חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> and fifty וּמָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> two hundred מַחְתֹּ֑ת <WH4289> censers וְאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you וְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> thou also and Aaron אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> each מַחְתָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH4289> [of you] his censer

וַיִּקְח֞וּ <WH3947> And they took אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man מַחְתָּת֗וֹ <WH4289> his censer וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> and put עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> and אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> fire וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> in them and laid עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and קְטֹ֑רֶת <WH7004> incense וַֽיַּעַמְד֗וּ <WH5975> thereon and stood פֶּ֛תַח <WH6607> in the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation וּמֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> with Moses וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> and Aaron

וַיַּקְהֵ֨ל <WH6950> gathered עֲלֵיהֶ֥ם <WH5921> against קֹ֙רַח֙ <WH7141> And Korah אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> all the congregation אֶל־ <WH413> at פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> against them unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וַיֵּרָ֥א <WH7200> appeared כְבוֹד־ <WH3519> and the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> unto all the congregation פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הִבָּ֣דְל֔וּ <WH914> Separate מִתּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> yourselves from among הָעֵדָ֣ה <WH5712> this congregation הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> I וַאַכַלֶּ֥ה <WH3615> that I may consume אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> כְּרָֽגַע׃ <WH7281> them in a moment

וַיִּפְּל֤וּ <WH5307> And they fell עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵיהֶם֙ <WH6440> upon their faces וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said אֵ֕ל <WH410> O God אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God הָרוּחֹ֖ת <WH7307> of the spirits לְכָל־ <WH3605> of all בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> of all flesh הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָד֙ <WH259> shall one יֶחֱטָ֔א <WH2398> sin וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> with כָּל־ <WH3605> the entire הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> assembly תִּקְצֹֽף׃ <WH7107> and wilt thou be wroth פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> unto the congregation לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הֵֽעָלוּ֙ <WH5927> Get you up מִסָּבִ֔יב <WH5439> from about לְמִשְׁכַּן־ <WH4908> the tabernacle קֹ֖רַח <WH7141> of Korah דָּתָ֥ן <WH1885> Dathan וַאֲבִירָֽם׃ <WH48> and Abiram

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> rose up מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> and went אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּתָ֣ן <WH1885> unto Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֑ם <WH48> and Abiram וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> and went אַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> him זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> And he spake אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעֵדָ֜ה <WH5712> unto the congregation לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying ס֣וּרוּ <WH5493> Depart נָ֡א <WH4994> now מֵעַל֩ <WH5921> from אָהֳלֵ֨י <WH168> I pray you from the tents הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> men הָֽרְשָׁעִים֙ <WH7563> of these wicked הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> of these וְאַֽל־ <WH408> nay תִּגְּע֖וּ <WH5060> and touch בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לָהֶ֑ם פֶּן־ <WH6435> or תִּסָּפ֖וּ <WH5595> nothing of theirs lest ye be consumed בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all חַטֹּאתָֽם׃ <WH2403> in all their sins

וַיֵּעָל֗וּ <WH5927> So they gat up מֵעַ֧ל <WH5921> and מִשְׁכַּן־ <WH4908> from the tabernacle קֹ֛רֶח <WH7141> of Korah דָּתָ֥ן <WH1885> Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֖ם <WH48> and Abiram מִסָּבִ֑יב <WH5439> on every side וְדָתָ֨ן <WH1885> and Dathan וַאֲבִירָ֜ם <WH48> and Abiram יָצְא֣וּ <WH3318> came out נִצָּבִ֗ים <WH5324> and stood פֶּ֚תַח <WH6607> in the door אָֽהֳלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH168> of their tents וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֥ם <WH802> and their wives וּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> and their sons וְטַפָּֽם׃ <WH2945> and their little children

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> said מֹשֶׁה֒ <WH4872> And Moses בְּזֹאת֙ <WH2063> you תֵּֽדְע֔וּן <WH3045> Hereby ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> that the LORD שְׁלָחַ֔נִי <WH7971> hath sent לַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <WH6213> me to do אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַֽמַּעֲשִׂ֖ים <WH4639> all these works הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these כִּי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֖א <WH3808> own מִלִּבִּֽי׃ <WH3820> for [I have] not [done them] of mine own mind

אִם־ <WH518> If כְּמ֤וֹת <WH4194> the common death כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> of all men יְמֻת֣וּן <WH4191> If these men die אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וּפְקֻדַּת֙ <WH6486> after the visitation כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָ֣אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of all men יִפָּקֵ֖ד <WH6485> or if they be visited עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> and לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [then] the LORD שְׁלָחָֽנִי׃ <WH7971> hath not sent
